---
title: "Upwork - Data Analysis Study"
output: html_document
date: "2023-06-05"
---



```{r}
data <- read.csv("income.csv")
lm1 <- lm(data$Income ~ data$Occupation)
model <- aov(lm1)
summary(model)

lm2 <- lm(data$Income ~ data$Occupation + data$Age + data$Race + data$Education + data$Sex + data$Age*data$Occupation + data$Race*data$Occupation + data$Education*data$Occupation + data$Sex*data$Occupation)

summary(lm2)



```
